ref: 10059 māˊyatē māˊti ʻ measures ʼ Dhātup. [Cf. mímītē ʻ measures ʼ RV., ʻ corresponds in measure, is large enough for ʼ BhP., ʻ is contained in ʼ Kāv. -- Poss., though not necessary, Drav. semantic influence, cf. Tam. aḷava ʻ measure ʼ ~ Tel. aḍapu ʻ be contained ʼ A. Master BSOAS xii 359. -- √mā]
Pk. māi, māaï tr. ʻ measures ʼ, intr. ʻ fits into ʼ;
L. māvaṇ, pres. part. mã̄dā ʻ to be contained in, hold, receive ʼ;
H. mānā ʻ to be contained in ʼ; O
G. māi ʻ is contained in ʼ,
G. māvũ ʻ to be comprised, hold (of a measure of capacity) ʼ;
M. māṇẽ ʻ to be contained in ʼ. <-> See māpayati.
